item.description:
Hi Guys,

We would like to welcome you to a special party this Friday where we are giving back.

Party like a VIP. Party for Free. On us..

* Free Cover for everyone before 11pm.

* Free champagne reception on the Guestlist from 10:30 - 11:30 PM.

* Free Street Parking till 2:00 AM.

Party starts at 10:15 PM. Goes until 2:00 AM

Dj Rink will be playing Top 40/ Hip Hop/ House and Intl Music all night long

Bring your dancing shoes onn and invite your friends. Last week we got busy but had a late crowd and people couldn't get inn. This week will be no different..

Party is at:
Level 2 @ The Bar Room Boston - 5 Broad Street, Boston MA. (Plenty of Free Street Parking in the Area. Also parking at the Langham hotel for $10)

To attend the VIP Champagne reception and for the Free Cover before 11pm for everyone RSVP: Generationdesi@gmail.com

Note: This is a PVT Drink Reception and you need to RSVP to attend the Champagne reception and to get in for Free.

x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x
item.name: Bar Room this Friday - (Free Cover & Free Champagne Reception)
